nodes.bodyText: I would change one of the versions in the list output. Then assert on that version so that we know the replacement is working.
nodes.diffHunk:

         );
         addExecutableOutput(goListOutput, "go", "list", "-m");

+            "}",

nodes.bodyText: Have you considered using a POJO here?
